dc_title_s: India: Village Points with Socio-Demographic and Economic Census Data, 2001
dc_description_s: This point dataset shows villages of India for 2001. Includes Town socio-demographic Census attribute data such as total population, population by sex, rural/urban populations, household, literacy, and employment statistics. This layer is part of the India State Basemap dataset which includes socio-demographic and economic Census data for 2001 at the State, District, Sub-District, and Town levels. This data layer is sourced from secondary government sources, chiefly Survey of India, Census of India, Election Commission, etc. Scale 1:1,000,000.Village level demographic analysis.
